newsArray.title: Did Gautam Gambhir spoil Team India? The alarm bells rang even before the T20 World Cup
newsArray.description: Team India lost the second T20 International against South Africa by 51 runs. Chasing a huge target of 214 runs, the Indian team was all out for 162 runs. The biggest reason for the loss was the constant experimentation with the batting order, which has a connection with the team's head coach Gautam Gambhir. The [...]

newsArray.title: Corruption Scandal Hits SMAT 2025: Assam Suspends 4 Cricketers, Files FIR Over Alleged Misconduct
newsArray.description: The Assam Cricket Association on Friday suspended four players — Amit Sinha, Ishan Ahmed, Aman Tripathi and Abhishek Thakuri — following their alleged involvement in corrupt practices during the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy 2025.
creator: PTI

newsArray.title: Sports News | Yuvraj Singh Delighted as New Chandigarh Stadium Names Stand After Him
newsArray.description: Get latest articles and stories on Sports at LatestLY. Former India all-rounder Yuvraj Singh expressed his heartfelt gratitude after a stand was named in his honour at the Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium in New Chandigarh. The venue is located in the state where his cricketing journey first began, making the recognition even more special for the 2011 World Cup winner.
creator: ANI
